nodes.text: The invasion of Saleucami was an invasion of the Outer Rim world of Saleucami. It was launched by the Confederacy of Independent Systems at some point between 21 BBY and 19 BBY during the Clone Wars, a galactic conflict fought between the Confederacy and Galactic Republic. Saleucami had also been the site of a battle between Republic and Separatist forces earlier in the war.

The Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt narrowly missed the invasion, but he proceeded to be in the midst of the sneak attack on Roche. Later in the war, the Republic besieged Saleucami during the Outer Rim Sieges campaign. The Separatist invasion and Republic siege brought widespread fighting to the world.
The invasion of Saleucami was first mentioned in James Luceno's 2016 novel, Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel.
